prompt.instruction: Resolve any conflicts or ambiguities in the proposed document placement.

field_descriptions.description: List of detected conflict types requiring resolution, or null if none detected. Possible values: "unknown_vendor" (vendor could not be identified), "potential_multi_purpose" (document may serve multiple archival purposes).

output.field: list of alternatives if document serves multiple purposes, or null
explanation of decision when conflicts exist (required), or null when no conflicts

prompt.default_case: If no conflicts exist or the proposed path is acceptable, confirm it with resolution_notes set to null (not a string).
